trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around September 20th 1982
Summary: driving to Sacramento, CA from Vacaville, CA. 4 transparent object in a triangle formation. then another to the west. then a glowing orb above us. Daytime sighting.
divs: Sighting Detailswas driving to work with my boss. then as we came over a hill near Vacaville, CA we saw 4 disc, transparent (almost cloudy in substance)objects in the sky over what seemed like would have been Sacramento, CA. by the distance they were seen at they must have been huge because a plane at that distance would have looked smaller, im sure of it. my first thought was ufo and so was my bosses. then off to the west there was another disc shaped object. all were hovering. i tried to take a video of the event but when filmimg i could not get my phone camera to pick it up, bummer! as we were driving i looked up and saw an orb flying toward the other ufos and then it just dissapeard then the others followed in the disapearing act.
